description:
A Git client designed for humans


Fixes
- Remember zoom setting after restart. Use default zoom keys to try avoid issues with different keyboard layouts #200 #202
- Fix a bug where GitFiend wouldn't launch if a certain dll was missing #204
- Remove buggy retry button from the missing Git dialog #197
- Apple Silicon version no longer contains an Intel build of gitfiend-core
- Truncate very long lines of code to fix a case where the UI can freeze for a while
- Fix a bug where option to merge was missing #205
